definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: In particular, those who trade in the equipment of special seal engraving shall register their sales for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 销售特种印章制作设备的，应当将销售情况登记备查。

sentences.english: The matter that will register on bank draft is best and whole plan come down for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 将银行汇票上登记的事项最好全部计下来备查。

sentences.english: It shall set up a roll of workers for reference.
sentences.chinese: 用人单位应当建立职工名册备查。

sentences.english: All cable records in the entire warranty period should be archived for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 所有线缆记录在整个担保期间都应当存档备查。

sentences.english: The Testing center will preservers some samples for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 检验结束后，我中心将留存部分样品备查。

sentences.english: Voice comments are saved along with individual images for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 语音评论一起保存备查个人图像文件。

sentences.english: Keep every one of the price lists on file for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 把所有的价钱表存档，以便今后备查。

sentences.english: Records on the bid opening shall be made and shall be placed on files for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 开标过程应当记录，并存档备查。

sentences.english: Keep all the price lists on file for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 把所有的价格表存档，以便今后备查。

sentences.english: This card should be kept on file for reference.
When testing is over, the testing center will preserve some samples for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 检验结束后，我中心将留存部分样品备查。

sentences.english: Please return the ratified application form back to the Personnel Office for file registration and verification.
sentences.chinese: 核准后本申请表请送回人事室，以便登录及存档备查。

sentences.english: Minutes shall be kept of the bid opening procedures and be filed for future reference.
sentences.chinese: 开标过程应当记录，并存档备查。

sentences.english: The sales account and photocopies of the certification materials shall be preserved for 2 years for reference and examination.
sentences.chinese: 销售台账和证明材料复印件应当保存2年备查。

sentences.english: Please keep relevant information for future reference in case of need.
sentences.chinese: 请妥善保存相关资料，以供本院应主管机关要求备查。

definition: to file away/to place on file
to file/to save a file (computer)/saved data (for a video game etc)
receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
